DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to compare two different contact lenses during 4 weeks of wear.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Two Silicone Hydrogel Lenses Over a One Month Period
DOC.criteria: Current soft contact lens wearer who wear their habitual lenses for no less than 10 hours a day, 5 days a week Have a need for correction in both eyes and be correctable to at least 20/40 distance vision in each eye while wearing trial lenses Replace lenses on a weekly or longer schedule Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply Requires concurrent ocular medication Eye injury or surgery within twelve weeks immediately prior to enrollment Evidence of systemic or ocular abnormality, infection, or disease likely to affect successful wear of contact lenses or use of their accessory solutions Current soft toric lens wearers Those who dispose of their soft lenses on a daily basis Current NIGHT & DAY® or Biofinity® lens wearers Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
